description: Join us on Feb 11 at 11:30 AM in Hong Kong for an exclusive KOLs brunch bringing together market insights and influential opinions shaping the future of blockchain and digital assets. This intimate gathering is designed for strategic conversations, networking, and collaboration in a relaxed setting. No panels or pitch decks just fine dining and candid dialogue with peers actively deploying capital and building the next wave of innovation. Date & Time: 11 Feb, 11:30AM 13:30PM Venue: TBC Guests : Limited to 30 selected participants Space is limited. Apply to attend and secure your spot.
